title: The Jurassic Park franchise : domestic and global box office revenue 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 among the 2 groups and in Jurassic Park III, Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD 3688.0.
Among all the Movies, Worldwide had the highest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic World and lowest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic Park III.
There is a gap of 13029.0 between the highest and lowest Box office gross in million USD found for Worldwide in Movie Jurassic World and Jurassic Park III.
yAxis: Box office gross in million USD
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Box office gross in million USD on the Y-axis for 5 different Movies for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic World and Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic Park III.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 among the 2 groups and in Jurassic Park III, Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD 3688.0.
Among all the Movies, Worldwide had the highest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic World and lowest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic Park III.
There is a gap of 13029.0 between the highest and lowest Box office gross in million USD found for Worldwide in Movie Jurassic World and Jurassic Park III.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.
Out of all 2 groups, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic World and Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic Park III.
Among all the Movies, Worldwide had the highest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic World and lowest Box office gross in million USD in Movie Jurassic Park III.

The maximum Box office gross in million USD for Worldwide that was found in Movie Jurassic World was 4.53 times larger than the minimum Box office gross in million USD observed in Movie Jurassic Park III.
Among all 2 groups, North America had the gap of 47110.0 between the maximum and minimum Box office gross in million USD observed in Movie Jurassic World and Jurassic Park III respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups North America, and Worldwide, the Movie Jurassic World is the maximum Box office gross in million USD and Jurassic Park III is the minimum Box office gross in million USD.
